mapper.insert: insert into orders(merchant_uid, member_no, member_name, expert_no, expert_name, service_no, service_name, price, state) values(#{merchantUid}, #{memberNo}, #{memberName}, #{expertNo}, #{expertName}, #{serviceNo}, #{serviceName}, #{price}, #{state})
mapper.select: select o.merchant_uid, o.expert_name, o.service_name, o.price, o.state, c.balance from orders o join cash c on o.merchant_uid = c.merchant_uid and o.member_no=#{memberNo} order by o.time asc
